ack.title: Acknowledgement
ack.p: We would like to thank all participants who contributed to the success of this roundtable. This meeting was organized by the VHPB and the related project was supported by the IFPMA (International Federation of International Federation of Pharmaceutical Manufacturers & Associations).

The Viral Hepatitis Prevention Board is supported by unrestricted grants from GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals, Sanofi Pasteur MSD, Sanofi Pasteur, Merck, Gilead, Abbvie and several European Universities and other institutes.

sec.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
sec.p: All authors participated at the meeting, DF drafted the meeting report. All other authors provided considerable input during the drafting and finalization of the manuscript. They also reviewed and approved the final version.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
